channel.title: Stop item being dropped from npc help!
channel.description: hi, on my server white phat is a mod and admin only item but some ppl seem to be getting frm drops some1 said frm a man, ive looked in npc drops and there isnt either item code 1048 or 1049 which is white phat in there, could somebody help me pl0x

item.title: Stop item being dropped from npc help!
item.dc:creator: @palex palex
item.description:
@palex wrote:

nope i deleted from crystal chest but i dunno how hes gettin em he ses men but i dunno?

Read full topic
item.source: Stop item being dropped from npc help!

item.title: Stop item being dropped from npc help!
item.dc:creator: @Cameron Cameron
item.description:
@Cameron wrote:

Maybe they are getting it from the crystal chest. There is a tutorial in the tutorial section explaining how to change them.

Read full topic
